title: Blueprint, "Central Station Industry Exhibit, Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition of 1933: Portable Indirect Bridge", 1933
medium: Blueprint on white wove paper, ruled border
inscribed: Inscribed at lower right: PORTABLE INDIRECT BRIDGE LAMP/CENTRAL STATION INDUSTRY EXHBT./A CENTURY OF PROGRESS-1933/Drawn by E.R.D. MAR. 25-1933/ C.E. Co. - TESTING DEPT./SCALE-F.S. Inscribed throughout with dimensions, instructions, materials
description: Blueprint plan for a portable, indirect bridge lamp for the living room of the Central Station Industry exhibit at the 1933 Chicago World's Fair. Drawing done in full size scale. Probably a three-bulb floor lamp.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Central Station Industry Exhibit, Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition of 1933: Portable Indirect Bridge", 1933.
1933. Blueprint on white wove paper, ruled border. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-284.
